summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin UI for Form Configuration. Backend API: 18/18 tests passed. Frontend UI: All features working correctly - page loads with 17 configs, tabs filter correctly, Add/Edit dialogs work, category filter dropdown works.

issues: Minor: Notifications fetch failing in background (non-blocking) - 'Failed to fetch notifications' console error

seed_data_creation: 17 default configurations seeded (8 placeholders, 6 listed by options, 2 preferences, 1 visibility rule)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Form Config Admin UI fully functional. Backend APIs tested: GET /api/admin/form-config (list), /stats, /seed, POST (create), PUT (update), DELETE, and public endpoint /api/form-config/public. UI tested: tabs switch correctly, Add/Edit dialogs open with correct forms, category filter works, toggle active status works.

tested_features.stats_endpoint: PASS - Returns total=17, active=17, categories_configured=9, by_type breakdown
tested_features.list_configs: PASS - Returns paginated list with correct structure
tested_features.filter_by_type: PASS - Filters by placeholder, seller_type, preference, visibility_rule
tested_features.create_config: PASS - Creates new config with config_data
tested_features.public_endpoint: PASS - Returns formatted config for frontend (no auth required)
tested_features.auth_required: PASS - Admin endpoints return 401 without auth

ui_features_verified.page_loads: PASS - Form Config page loads with stats cards showing 17 configs
ui_features_verified.tabs_work: PASS - 5 tabs (All, Placeholders, Listed By, Preferences, Visibility Rules) filter correctly
ui_features_verified.add_dialog: PASS - Opens with Category, Subcategory, Config Type, Priority, Active toggle, config-specific fields
ui_features_verified.edit_dialog: PASS - Opens with pre-filled data, shows Update button
ui_features_verified.table_display: PASS - Shows category, type chip, preview, status chip, priority, action buttons
